name: Pak de Robijn! Oh nee, de Tovenaar!
name_original: Pak de Robijn! Oh nee, de Tovenaar!
description:
[Game playable in English]

Made in 48 hours for our second Ludum Dare. Get the wizard to turn your environment into rubies or get damaged yourself for extra points.

made in collab with: Luan Stotijn, Thomas Groot and Jonathan Gerbscheid
